Reviews.Title: Not In English
Reviews.Author: Ann B
Reviews.Content: When I first turned the camera on, everything was in Korean. I removed the batteries but that didn't help.So, I broke-down and turned to the 300-page printed manual... KOREAN!Of the 7 printed documents shipped with the camera, there was not a single word of ENGLISH!So, unless you are fluent in the dialects of the Orient... avoid this camera!

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: TexasTom
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera to take pictures of my golf students.  It takes high quality slow motion pictures equal in quality to cameras costing 5 times or more.  It also takes beautiful still photos that are very easy to e-mail friends and relatives.
